name: Life is an illusion
metadata:
{"name": "illusion %1","description": "Life is an illusion: this is a unique collection of 42 impressionist photos from different parts of the world dedicated to Anna`s father. Each work contains 42 copies. 

Metadata and compressed images stored on-chain, original photos stored on IPFS. 
This is the 1 work. 

Life is an illusion 
A strange game of half-slumber 
It seems to me that 
Everything is about to collapse 
I love you 
The sun","image": "ipfs://bafybeih7hoid5vbphjaclajybi2czwl5xtnj7lpgwgsyaodgxkssqh3bo4/1.jpg","base64Image": "data:image/webp;base64,","license": "CC BY-NC 4.0"}
